attributes.action: Save services at Goole Fire Station
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are urging residents of the Courier region to sign our petition which calls to maintain the current level of cover at the town's fire station. Plans have been unveiled to turn one of the Larsen Road crews from full time to retained, a move which is believed could cost lives.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Save services at Goole Fire Station."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15642.asp

Prime Minister's Office
